episodes.title: FULL PRESSER: Epstein Survivors Speak Out Ahead of Attorney General Pam Bondi House Testimony | AC15
episodes.description:
WATCH LIVE as Epstein survivors join members of the Democratic Women’s Caucus in Washington, D.C., ahead of Attorney General Pam Bondi’s testimony before the House Judiciary Committee.

The press conference covers:

Key issues surrounding the Epstein investigation

Survivors’ perspectives and calls for justice

Congressional oversight and upcoming testimony of AG Bondi

Efforts to protect victims and reform policies related to sexual abuse cases

Stay tuned for full coverage, critical statements, and insights into this high-profile congressional hearing.

📍 Location: Washington, D.C.
📅 Date: February 2026

episodes.title: FULL: Epstein Survivors, Dem Women Blasts Trump & Bondi, Call Out GOP & Justice Over Epstein | AC1E
episodes.description:
Survivors of Jeffrey Epstein’s trafficking ring, joined by members of the Democratic Women’s Caucus, delivered emotional and forceful remarks demanding accountability from the Trump administration, Attorney General Pam Bondi, and Republican lawmakers over the handling of newly released Epstein files.

Speakers accused the Department of Justice of failing to protect victims, exposing survivors’ personal information, and shielding powerful figures connected to Epstein.

Key moments:

• Survivors share painful personal testimonies
• Calls for full investigations into Epstein’s associates
• DOJ criticized for file redactions and privacy failures
• Lawmakers demand answers from AG Pam Bondi
• Bipartisan calls for justice and transparency
• “They should be ashamed” – fiery condemnation of leadership

Watch the full press conference and complete remarks.

#EpsteinFiles #JeffreyEpstein #SurvivorsSpeak #JusticeForVictims #BreakingNews #Trump #DOJ #PamBondi #Democrats #USPolitics #Accountability #PressConference
